nl.inl.blacklab.index

Class PluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.index.PluginManager

  • public class PluginManager
extends Object
    Responsible for loading file conversion and tagging plugins.

    It will attempt to load all conversion and tagging plugins (according to the ServiceLoader system) and initialize them with their respective settings from the main blacklab config.

    A jar that wishes to register a plugin must contain a file named "nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.preprocess.(Tag|Covert)Plugin" inside "META-INF/services/", containing the qualified classNames of the implementations they contain.

        public static void initPlugins(BLConfigPlugins pluginConfig)
        Attempts to load and initialize all plugin classes on the classpath, passing the values in the config to the matching plugin.
        Parameters:

         {
   "pluginId": {
     // arbitrary plugin config here
   },

   "anotherPluginId": { ... },
   ...
